::Scrat::

A small stasis pod falls somewhere in the forests of Africa, crashing trough 
a few trees and startling the wildlife. It lands at an angle, the scanners 
successfully emerging to scan a suitible lifeform. A few moments later, the 
pod opens, a small bot carefully sitting up. His small eyes nervioustly 
scanned the area, yelping and jumping back into his pod as he sees something 
move in the trees. Several minutes later, he carefully pokes his head out, 
looking around.

Nothing moved.

Scrat breathes a sigh of relief, trembling in fear as he slowly climbs out of 
the pod. He stood three feet tall, with a small knife as his only weapond. 
His entire life had been spent in fear, and this place was no different. He 
shivers in fear, moving off into the forest, regretfully leaving his small 
pod behind.
